name: klaus
text: God I love this arc as well.

name: peppermint
text: Was the Ray-Suit ever explained?

name: william
text: It's just a badass halloween costume.  Ray probably passed out before taking it off.

name: andyfaewatford
text:
It reminds me a lot of the credits to the A-Team, where Hannibal was in a Godzilla costume, and he opened up the face to smoke a cigar.

Anyone?

name: straw
text: I like that, if you think about it, Ray is completely laying down here.

name: i_love_kate
text:
So I'm guessing nothing's in the cocktail glass?

Actually, I suppose it would make sense if it was just a prop. Another component of the Ray costume.

name: tronwell
text: i'm going to guess that given the presence of the bendy straw the glass probably held not less than one bottle of gin and more than a mere splash of vermouth.

name: zapatos
text: or no gin, since Ray drinks Diamond Juice.

name: blitztrug
text: also you can see in the first few panels that there is a hole in which you can put said bendy straw

name: mercuri0us
text: No he's just sleeping standing up in the suit.

name: connormc
text: I like that he holds the phone up to his costumed ear, not his real ear.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: He dressed up as himself. That is cold hard.

name: st-elmos_fire
text:
alt text: Ray double-sized himself for Halloween, except for his liver.

Ray logic dictates that if he is bigger he can drink more, even if he is not really bigger and his liver is the same size, hence giant martini glass.

name: cuddlefish
text: A comment left by cuddlefish was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tthug, professorhazard, Deusoma, salo, farqussus, jezebel, charchar)

name: farqussus
text: credit the alt-text when you straight out verbatim it.

name: mugi
text: I enjoy the use of verbatim as a verb.

name: boredom_man
text: It is a good verbing.

name: i_love_kate
text: And verbing is a good gerunding!

name: atticusonline
text: or else

name: shutup_shutup
text: Aw shit, that alt-text was straight out verbatimed to pieces!

name: thommy_h
text: Seriously the best halloween costume ever.

name: catachresis
text: The double-size drink makes it.

name: noah
text: With a straw, to fit through the Ray-suit's mouth-hole.

name: epicurus
text:
I have had mornings like this.

Panel #9 KILLS me. You can tell how fucking annoyed he is to have some asshole calling him the morning after haloween talking about the news.

name: never_die
text: we all should answer the phone like that when we are woken up.  just to let the other person know where we stand.

name: hollis
text: "Let's re-talk tomorrow."  A good way of saving syllables when it hurts to talk.

name: tellumo
text: Also the line preceding that one. That is the best description of a hangover ever.

name: jhunter
text:
"I can feel bits of my brain falling away like a wet cake"
"I feel like a pig shat in my head"
"I've got a bastard behind the eyes"
"My head feels like there's a frenchman living in it"

there are many ways to describe a hangover, the more colourful the better; I do not think I could ever cold pick a favourite

name: overmedicated
text: You forgot 'I feel like I've been beaten up underwater.'

name: straw
text: Ray is not asking questions he is cold saying things

name: jezebel
text: That's my favorite part.  Ray is in too much double-martini pain to even put the little lilt at the end of "Did you know that" to make it a proper question.

name: deancain29
text: I looooove the Ray suit idea

name: professorhazard
text: It is Ray's least useful hull.

name: foetus_punch
text: I clicked on that about seven times, thinking it was a link. I got very frustrated, and then noticed my mistake. Here, have a chubby as recompense for repeatedly highlighting your words.

name: heccibiggs
text: Clicked on what? Clicked on what?

name: foetus_punch
text: I...don't...know...

name: i_love_kate
text: Foetus Punch has (had?) a crush on being high.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I'd say "I...don't...know..." twice, but I'm just not feeling all that discombobulated.

name: ham_shoes
text: I for one would like to see the return of hulls.

name: luckypyjamas
text: the ray suit sort of reminds me of arthur from pat's support group

name: spinynorman
text: It's also smiling like a donut, much like Trebeck's wife, so that's also appropriate for Aaaaaarthur.

name: chuchurocket
text: hmm...i have to wonder why ray had to open the face panel to answer the phone, but was able to hear through the head anyway.

name: agentj
text: Ray Doesn't Pay Attention-Watch '05: Day Two

name: phthoggos
text: I would buy a Ray suit.

name: dusty
text: I wish i looked distinctive enough to make a giant mascot style version of my head to wear as part of a costume, but I'm too generic looking.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Pat: Hallowe'en!

name: i_love_kate
text: Pat turns down the dick factor for Hallowe'en.

name: heccibiggs
text: Not by much.

name: cagliostro
text:
I don't think I ever went trick-or-treating, but if I had, I can only imagine how pleased I'd have been to receive a sanctimonious lecture about falcons and a packet of delicious ketchup .

I would not have been very pleased.

name: splendorr
text: I've known when things are hilarious for most of life. Even as a child, this sort of disruption of expected outcomes would have delighted me no-endedly. What a strange cat man, Pat man.

name: stormagnet
text: True story time! In high school, my siblings and I were so infamous that one Halloween, another group of kids dressed up like [i]us[/] for their costumes.

name: stormagnet
text:
*headsmacks*


Dammit, self. We've been over this. DON'T DRINK AND POST.

name: spicyponyhead
text: How far you've fallen from kids dressing up like you for Halloween.

name: dasuta
text: For a few seconds, I was wondering what Arthur was doing with Ray's glasses, but I was soon shown what tomfoolery was afoot.

name: tttt2
text: "that fake ad"

name: bozendoka
text: Some entrepreneuring individual simply must make that ad.  Or if it exists, said individual must find and then post a link to it.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
I regret nothing.
[IMGS OFF]

Much love and thanks to Patrick Alexander for allowing me the use of his characters . He's the fuckin' bomb, yo. Please go read his comics immediately.

name: fattypneumonia
text: http://i826.photobucket.com/albums/zz190/fattypneumonia/cuervobrain.jpg

name: direhaggis
text: I'm thinking the drink is normal Ray-sized. That is some stone cold serious 'hair of the dog that bit me' right there. That is enough bull terrier to kill a normal man.

name: wonelove
text:
Double sized Ray
&
double sized drinks

name: splendorr
text:
&
double sized hang
&
Double sized over

name: panopticism
text: squeee

name: preston
text: I read this strip stoned once, and the idea of Ray's suit holding a cell phone while he talked inside of it completely blew my fucking mind.

name: splendorr
text: Well, you'd better go catch it.

name: a386
text: panels one through five are beautiful. the complete lack of information
